title: [Bug]: llama-13b amp_master_grad+loss_scale=65535 训练loss为0
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
- paddlepaddle: N/A
- paddlepaddle-gpu: 2.5.1
- paddlenlp: 68bb39d
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
llama-13b 单机八卡A100 mp=8训练开启amp_master_grad，当loss_scale=65536时，在step=59 时loss会降至0。关闭amp_master_grad正常。

猜测：开启amp_master_grad后，`check_nan_or_inf_and_unscale`不生效。由于loss_scale过大，导致梯度中出现inf，从而出现loss为0？
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

训练脚本：
```bash
set -x
SCRIPT_HOME=$(cd $(dirname $0); pwd)

CARDS="0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7"
export NCCL_SHM_DISABLE=1

task_name="llama_hybrid"
rm -rf "$SCRIPT_HOME/output/$task_name/"
rm -rf "$SCRIPT_HOME/output/${task_name}_log"

TP=8
PP=1
SHARDING_STAGE="stage2"


rm -rf $SCRIPT_HOME/profiler/llama


python -u  -m paddle.distributed.launch \
    --devices=$CARDS \
    --log_dir "output/$task_name""_log" \
    run_pretrain.py \
    --model_type "llama" \
    --model_name_or_path "facebook/llama-13b" \
    --tokenizer_name_or_path "facebook/llama-13b" \
    --input_dir "./data" \
    --output_dir "output/$task_name" \
    --split 949,50,1 \
    --max_seq_length 512 \
    --per_device_train_batch_size 4 \
    --per_device_eval_batch_size 4 \
    --use_flash_attention 0 \
    --use_fused_rms_norm 0 \
    --fp16 \
    --fp16_opt_level "O2" \
    --scale_loss 65536 \
    --amp_master_grad 1 \
    --tensor_parallel_degree $TP \
    --pipeline_parallel_degree $PP \
    --sharding $SHARDING_STAGE \
    --learning_rate 1.0e-5 \
    --min_learning_rate 1.0e-7 \
    --max_steps 10000 \
    --save_steps 10000 \
    --weight_decay 0.01 \
    --adam_beta1 0.9 \
    --adam_beta2 0.95 \
    --warmup_ratio 0.02 \
    --logging_steps 1 \
    --dataloader_num_workers 0 \
    --gradient_accumulation_steps 1 \
    --eval_steps 1000 \
    --report_to "visualdl" \
    --disable_tqdm true \
    --continue_training 0 \
    --recompute 1 \
    --do_train \
    --device "gpu" \
    --overwrite_output_dir True \
    --amp_custom_black_list 'matmul' 'matmul_v2' 'mul'
```

日志文件：
[workerlog.log](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/files/12836713/workerlog.log)

title: [Question]: 合同文本信息抽取效果不好
body:
### 请提出你的问题

需求: 对合同文本进行甲方,乙方,合同编号,合同金额信息抽取

数据标注文件: label_studio.json, 使用 label-studio==1.6.0进行数据标注, 大概选择了38张合同文件, 只标注了甲方,乙方和合同金额, 进行测试

操作平台: aistudio
python默认版本, 好像是3.10.x, paddleocr 和 paddlenlp 都是 pip install --upgrade xxx 安装的
然后从 gitee 拉取的 paddleNlp 的代码, develop 分支的代码
使用PaddleNlp的代码脚本进行 label_studio.json 处理和 模型微调 (本来想尝试 uie-x-base, 但是提示 config.json, model_config.json 文件找不到, 就直接用的 uie-m-large)

操作根据github文档进行模型微调`https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/applications/information_extraction/text/README.md`,
微调后使用文档中的进行模型评估, 评估报错了, 我没管, 我直接进行预测, 预测效果不理想, 抽取结果甲方和乙方相同了, 而且金额我标注的都是大写, 如 肆仟元整, 金额出现抽取不出来的情况, 请问应该怎么做才能达到目标效果? 下面是我使用的脚本

数据处理
`python label_studio.py --label_studio_file /home/aistudio/work/label_studio.json --save_dir /home/aistudio/work/data --splits 0.76 0.24 0 --negative_ratio 3 --task_type ext`

模型微调
`python finetune.py  --device gpu --logging_steps 10 --save_steps 100 --eval_steps 100 --seed 1000 --model_name_or_path uie-m-large --output_dir /home/aistudio/work/checkpoint/model_best --train_path /home/aistudio/work/data/train.txt --dev_path /home/aistudio/work/data/dev.txt  --max_seq_len 512  --per_device_train_batch_size  4 --per_device_eval_batch_size 4 --num_train_epochs 20 --learning_rate 1e-5 'end_positions' --do_train --do_eval --do_export --export_model_dir /home/aistudio/work/checkpoint/model_best --overwrite_output_dir --disable_tqdm True --metric_for_best_model eval_f1 --load_best_model_at_end  True --save_total_limit 1
`

模型评估 (这个报错了)
`python evaluate.py --model_path /home/aistudio/work/checkpoint/model_best --test_path /home/aistudio/work/data/dev.txt --device gpu --batch_size 4--max_seq_len 512`

title: group null judge fix
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
Bug fixes
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others 
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
According to the api(paddle/distributed/communication/group.py:67:

```
def is_member(self):
    if self.rank < 0:
        return False
    if self.nranks < 2:
        return False
    return True
```
and the group build code:
```
if size > 1 and global_rank in ranks:
    rank = 0 if backend == 'heter' else ranks.index(global_rank)
    pg = _new_process_group_impl(
        backend,
        _default_store,
        rank,
        size,
        group_name,
        pg_options=None,
        group_id=gid,
    )
else:
    rank = -1
    pg = None
```
The code in PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/data/dist_dataloader.py, egg line 155:
`if self.mp_group is not None and self.pp_rank == 0:`
can not determine the existence of 'mp_group' correctly.

If there is no model_parallel, mp_group will be:
`rank: -1, nranks: 1, id: 12, ranks: 0; name: _default_pg12`
The broadcast_data_list() will cased error:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "run_pretrain.py", line 567, in <module>
    main()
  File "run_pretrain.py", line 549, in main
    train_result = trainer.train(resume_from_checkpoint=checkpoint)
  File "/workspace/PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/trainer/trainer.py", line 738, in train
    for step, inputs in enumerate(epoch_iterator):
  File "/workspace/PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/data/dist_dataloader.py", line 181, in __next__
    data_list = broadcast_data_list(data_list, paddle.int64, self.mp_rank, self.mp_group, self.mp_src_rank)
  File "/workspace/PaddleNLP/paddlenlp/data/dist_dataloader.py", line 210, in broadcast_data_list
    paddle.distributed.broadcast(size_cuda, src_rank, group=comm_group).wait()
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'wait'
```

title: [Question]: 相同业务场景和文本下新增抽取实体和关系后召回率差异极大
body:
### 请提出你的问题

环境为:
python3.7
paddlepaddle-gpu 2.4.2.post117
paddlenlp 2.5.2
cuda-version 11.7
GPU：A800

问题描述：在合同文本中抽取关系，合同文本长度有几千到一万字不等，由于有的关系涉及到的实体间隔比较远（该情况概率较小），在标注的时候是将整篇合同文本放进去进行标注的。在第一版的时候通过实体关系标注抽取的时候召回率和f1都有0.85左右，在第二版新增了实体种类和关系种类的时候，召回率为0.3，f1为0.4，较第一版差距比较大。同时，两版抽取schema中相同的实体和关系，第二版的效果也要远低于第一版的，不知道是不是被第二版标注的其他数据给影响到了整个的效果。

eg：全部合同文本涉及到多个类别，共有700份文件进行了标注，其中各类别分布不均匀，有的类别有100多个样本，有的类别是由10多个样本，但是部分样本在100的类别抽取效果也很不好。为了验证我尝试过将该类别样本单独提取出来做训练和推理，发现仅有该类别的情况下仍然效果不好。

![微信图片_20230922115050](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/145737041/528bca54-aca2-4dbf-9dba-2c0e5e985463)
eg：注释的schema是效果好一点的那一版，没注释的是效果比较差的
![微信图片_20230922115038](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/145737041/469b639c-fe07-40db-b5ba-66095ff3e367)

### Feature request

AI Studio 需要的功能：Fork后的项目里面需要有明显返回被Fork项目的链接。一个项目被Fork后，需要有原来项目的链接，需要能返回到原来的项目，因为项目被Fork后，原项目可能还会更新，需要有个很方便返回原项目的入口，例如一个链接。如果使用消息推送的方式，一是消息太多；二是消息不一定会看，不是太方便。

title: [llm]add quantization  tensor parallelism
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
 New features

### PR changes
Others 

### Description
```
import paddle
from paddlenlp.transformers import AutoModelForCausalLM, AutoTokenizer
import paddle
import paddle.distributed.fleet as fleet

world_size = paddle.distributed.get_world_size()

strategy = fleet.DistributedStrategy()
strategy.hybrid_configs = {
    "dp_degree": 1,
    "mp_degree": world_size,
    "pp_degree": 1,
    "sharding_degree": 1,
}
fleet.init(is_collective=True, strategy=strategy)
hcg = fleet.get_hybrid_communicate_group()
model_name_or_path = 'THUDM/chatglm2-6b'
tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_name_or_path)
model = AutoModelForCausalLM.from_pretrained(
    model_name_or_path,
    quantization_config={'quant_algo':'weight_only_int8'},
    dtype="float16",
    tensor_parallel_degree=world_size,
    tensor_parallel_rank=hcg.get_model_parallel_rank(),
    tensor_parallel_output=False)
model.save_pretrained('chatglm2_int8_tp2_merge', merge_tensor_parallel=True)
tokenizer.save_pretrained('chatglm2_int8_tp2_merge')
model.eval()
# tokenizer.pad_token_id = tokenizer.unk_token_id
for s in ['中国的首都是哪里', '你好']:
    inputs = tokenizer(s, return_tensors='pd', add_special_tokens=True, padding=True)
    pred = model.generate(
        **inputs,
        max_new_tokens=20,
        bos_token_id=tokenizer.bos_token_id,
        eos_token_id=tokenizer.eos_token_id,
        pad_token_id=tokenizer.pad_token_id,
        decode_strategy="greedy_search",
    )
    print(tokenizer.decode(pred[0][0]))
```

title: [LLM] Unify pipeline model with PretrainModelPipe
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
Unify pipeline model with PretrainModelPipe

```python
import paddle
import paddle.distributed.fleet as fleet
from paddlenlp.transformers import AutoModelForCausalLMPipe, AutoModelForCausalLM

world_size = paddle.distributed.get_world_size()

pp_degree = 2
tp_degree = world_size/2

strategy = fleet.DistributedStrategy()
strategy.hybrid_configs = {
    "dp_degree": 1,
    "mp_degree": tp_degree,
    "pp_degree": pp_degree,
    "sharding_degree": 1,
}
fleet.init(is_collective=True, strategy=strategy)
hcg = fleet.get_hybrid_communicate_group()

if pp_degree > 1:
    model_class = AutoModelForCausalLMPipe
else:
    model_class = AutoModelForCausalLM

model_name_or_path = "facebook/llama-7b"
# model_name_or_path = "__internal_testing__/tiny-random-llama"
model = model_class.from_pretrained(
    model_name_or_path,
    tensor_parallel_degree=tp_degree,
    tensor_parallel_rank=hcg.get_model_parallel_rank(),
    tensor_parallel_output=False,
)

model.eval()
```

title: trainer支持Moe模型的训练以及存储
body:
# 计划给refactor分支，增加的moe的功能， 
支持： 纯dp + moe , pp/mp/dp/sharding + moe

目前moe的通信组和dp的通信组绑定（目前没有开辟通信组，dp多少路，expert就有多少路）。

主要涉及到：
1. trainer 主循环修改（梯度同步跳过带有no_sync属性的weight）
2. trainer save/load， model.from_pretrained 逻辑的修改（非dp0节点，需要保留moe参数，并支持1键加载模型）
3. moe 情况下的pp/mp/dp 调整了一下 通信组的顺序（让 moe/dp 组放在中间，pp最外面）

title: [Question]: 升级PaddleNLP版本后使用senta模型预测会出现报错
body:
### 请提出你的问题

我们把PaddleNLP升级到了2.6.1 post，Paddle升级到2.5.1后运行之前一直在正常使用的的模型预测Python脚本，运行到
senta的处理时会报错，报错信息如下：
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/bxt/uie/PaddleNLP-develop/applications/sentiment_analysis/nlp_uie_aspect_setiment.py", line 28, in <module>
    res = senta(line.rstrip())
  File "/home/bxt/anaconda3/envs/uie/lib/python3.9/site-packages/paddlenlp/taskflow/taskflow.py", line 817, in __call__
    results = self.task_instance(inputs, **kwargs)
  File "/home/bxt/anaconda3/envs/uie/lib/python3.9/site-packages/paddlenlp/taskflow/task.py", line 527, in __call__
    outputs = self._run_model(inputs, **kwargs)
  File "/home/bxt/anaconda3/envs/uie/lib/python3.9/site-packages/paddlenlp/taskflow/sentiment_analysis.py", line 716, in _run_model
    results = self._multi_stage_predict(raw_inputs)
  File "/home/bxt/anaconda3/envs/uie/lib/python3.9/site-packages/paddlenlp/taskflow/sentiment_analysis.py", line 779, in _multi_stage_predict
    result_list = self._single_stage_predict(examples)
  File "/home/bxt/anaconda3/envs/uie/lib/python3.9/site-packages/paddlenlp/taskflow/sentiment_analysis.py", line 642, in _single_stage_predict
    self.predictor.run()
RuntimeError: (PreconditionNotMet) The meta data must be valid when call the mutable data function.
  [Hint: Expected valid() == true, but received valid():0 != true:1.] (at /paddle/paddle/phi/core/dense_tensor.cc:122)
  [operator < fill_constant > error]

senta是这样创建的：
senta = Taskflow("sentiment_analysis", model="uie-senta-base", schema=schema)
